item.title: About Darkwood
item.description: A new take on the survival horror genre and why it is worth your time.

item.description: Guide on how to create and run an intrigue campaign.

item.title: About Megacorporations and Space Colonization in Sci-Fi
item.description: My thoughts on the idea of "civilizing" space by the human race with commentary mostly based on the Alien universe and The Invincible.

item.title: The "accidentally racist" writing of Star Trek
item.description: A criticism on the portrayal of humanoid aliens in Star Trek
